Package models

Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Student
  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    The Student class represents a student in the university course registration system. It includes information such as username, password, and the list of courses associated with the student.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addStudent​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Adds a new student to the collection with the specified username and password.
      java.util.ArrayList<Course> getCourses()
      Retrieves the list of courses associated with the student.
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Retrieves the password of the student.
      static Student getStudentByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
      Retrieves a Student instance based on the provided username.
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Retrieves the username of the student.
      boolean isPasswordCorrect​(java.lang.String password)
      Checks if the provided password is correct for the student.
      void takeCourse​(Course course)
      Enrolls the student in a given course by adding it to the student's list of courses.

    • Method Detail

      • getStudentByUsername

        public static Student getStudentByUsername​(java.lang.String username)
        Retrieves a Student instance based on the provided username.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the student to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The Student instance if found, otherwise null.

      • addStudent

        public static void addStudent​(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password)
        Adds a new student to the collection with the specified username and password.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the new student.
        password - The password of the new student.

      • takeCourse

        public void takeCourse​(Course course)
        Enrolls the student in a given course by adding it to the student's list of courses. Additionally, adds the student to the course's list of enrolled students.
        Parameters:
        course - The course to be taken by the student.

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Retrieves the username of the student.
        Returns:
        The username of the student.

      • getPassword

        public java.lang.String getPassword()
        Retrieves the password of the student.
        Returns:
        The password of the student.

      • getCourses

        public java.util.ArrayList<Course> getCourses()
        Retrieves the list of courses associated with the student.
        Returns:
        The ArrayList containing all courses associated with the student.

      • isPasswordCorrect

        public boolean isPasswordCorrect​(java.lang.String password)
        Checks if the provided password is correct for the student.
        Parameters:
        password - The password to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if the password is correct, otherwise false.
